articles.title: Kim Jong Un Enjoys Art Performance of Servicemen's Families
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Enjoys Art Performance of Servicemen's Families
Pyongyang, December 9 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, together with the participants in the Second Meeting of KPA Exemplary Servicemen's Families, enjoyed a performance of art groups of servicemen's families of KPA units, who won at the fifth round of the second-term contest among art groups of KPA servicemen's families, and made a speech there.
					 Kim Jong Un together with Ri Sol Ju appeared in the auditorium of theatre.
					
					 The performance was given by members of art groups of servicemen's families of KPA units 564, 966, 233, 593, 287, 630, 380, 243, 468 and 600.
					
					 Its numbers included serial choruses "Eternal Smile", poem and story telling "Paektusan Family Members and Socialism" and drama on true story "Father".
					
					 The performers sang in an excited tone of the noble ideological and moral world of servicemen's families who remain loyal to the Songun revolutionary leadership of Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un, with their deep yearning and reverence for the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and the Supreme Commander.
					
					 Among the audience were Hwang Pyong So, So Hong Chan and Ryom Chol Song.
					
					 At the end of the performance, Kim Jong Un mounted the stage to make a speech.
					
					 In his speech he said that he came to realize once again the fact that the mightiness of the DPRK's revolutionary armed forces does not come only from the powerful sophisticated striking means and thanks to the devoted efforts of the servicemen's families, the KPA has fully discharged its noble mission and duty for the times and history to reliably defend the party and revolution despite any upheaval.
					
					 He noted that he was determined to work harder to lead the revolutionary armed forces to the eternal victory as the supreme commander, keeping their trust and expectation in his mind all the time.
					
					 It is the great pride of the party and country to have a large revolutionary force of such sturdy and great women as the servicemen's families, he added.
					
					 He stressed that their husbands and children will fight more bravely and always hold higher the red flag of revolution to live up to thier expectation.
					
					 Kim Jong Un called upon the servicemen's wives, including the participants in the meeting, to more reliably discharge their duty as cooks of the Korean revolution so that their husbands and children can remain intensely loyal to the revolution and more courageously take the lead in paving an untrodden path for the country's prosperity.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with Active Servicemen's Families
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with Active Servicemen's Families
Pyongyang, December 9 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, had a photo session with the participants in the Second Meeting of KPA Exemplary Servicemen's Families.
					 The meeting marks an important occasion in defending and further glorifying the idea of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu, the idea of attaching importance to the work of servicemen's families, and their undying leadership feats and in improving the above-said work as required by the developing revolution, he said, warmly congratulating its participants on their successful holding of the meeting with high political consciousness and revolutionary zeal.
					
					 Our servicemen's wives have grown to be the reliable eldest daughter-in-law of the country and a large contingent of women revolutionaries bearing a part in bolstering up the military strength under the special loving care of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu, he said, adding: The glorious history of our revolutionary armed forces is associated with the unknown merits of servicemen's wives who have obediently devoted their dreams and ideals in the days of their youth and their families' happiness to building up the military strength, regarding the state affairs dearer than family affairs.
					
					 And he gave a high appreciation of the servicemen's wives, noting that they are keeping step in mind with their husbands, who are revolutionaries-in-arms standing at the outpost of the class struggle, determined to fight for the Party and the revolution, the country and the people at the risk of their lives, and the closest comrades-in-arms of the Supreme Commander, and taking warm care of soldiers' living on behalf of the Supreme Commander as their real mothers would do.
					
					 The Party's trust and expectation in the servicemen's wives is great, he said, expressing the belief that they would take good care of their husbands so that they can devote themselves to their revolutionary work without any worry about housekeeping and would always live and struggle with the same attitude as that of a soldier standing on the frontline. Then he had a photo session with the participants.
					
					 Attending the session were Hwang Pyong So, Hyon Yong Chol, So Hong Chan, Pak Yong Sik, Ryom Chol Song and Jo Kyong Chol.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Message from Equatorial Guinean Party Leader
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Message from Equatorial Guinean Party Leader
Pyongyang, December 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, received a message from Jeronimo Osa Osa Ecoro, general secretary of the Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea, on December 2. 
					 In the message the general secretary of the Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea said the members of the party and its supporters pay the highest tribute to Kim Jong Il, eternal general secretary of the WPK and eternal chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, on behalf of Obiang Nguema Mbasogo, founder-chairman of the party, on the occasion of the third anniversary of his demise. 
					
					 The message extended the warmest salute to Kim Jong Un and the WPK and the Korean people, sincerely wishing the party and people fresh successes in their struggle.

articles.title: U.S. Slammed for Its Move to Refer DPRK "Human Rights Issue" to UNSC
articles.content:
U.S. Slammed for Its Move to Refer DPRK "Human Rights Issue" to UNSC
Pyongyang, December 9 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry gave the following answer to the question put by KCNA on Tuesday in connection with the fact that the U.S. is mulling officially bringing the DPRK "human rights issue" up for discussion at the UN Security Council:
					 The U.S. is scheming once again to abuse the UNSC for implementing its hostile policy towards the DPRK.
					
					 On Dec. 5 the U.S. and some forces of the UNSC toeing its line sent the president of the Security Council a joint letter calling for officially referring the DPRK "human rights issue" to the Security Council.
					
					 Why the U.S. is making so haste to refer the above-said "human rights issue" to the Security Council though the illegal anti-DPRK "human rights resolution" which it cooked up by setting its followers in motion has not gone through the necessary procedures at the UN General Assembly?
					
					 The U.S. is leaving no stone unturned to make the "resolution" an established fact, afraid that this political fraud may face ever bitterer rebuff and condemnation from the world people.
					
					 This is one more impudent reckless action which can be taken only by the gangster-like U.S. abusing the UN for its purpose of aggression through high-handed and arbitrary practices and swindle.
					
					 The U.S. is persistently working to refer non-existent DPRK "human rights issue" to the Security Council although there is the UN Human Rights Council, the organization specializing in human rights issues. This is prompted by its ulterior intention to invent a pretext for military invasion of the DPRK under the pretext of its "human rights issue".
					
					 The DPRK had already held in its address at the UN General Assembly this year that the Security Council should not offer a forum for applying the worst double standards and telling a whole string of lies any longer.
					
					 In July last when the DPRK Government formally filed in the Security Council the issue of putting an end to the U.S.-south Korea joint military drills posing a direct threat to international peace and security, the Security Council sidestepped it.
					
					 If the Security Council deliberately brings the above-said "human rights issue" irrelevant to security up for discussion under the pressure of the U.S. and its allies, it will be the most striking manifestation of the double standards.
					
					 An attempt to discuss the above-said issue at the UN Security Council on the basis of the "report submitted by the Commission of Inquiry (CI)" on the human rights situation in the DPRK which is full of prejudice and lies, a report which was not verified, will turn the council into a forum for discussing the fraudulent document.
					
					 A dangerous precedent in which a pretext was invented for igniting a war of aggression on the basis of the false statement made by the U.S. Secretary of State that "Iraq has WMDs" at the UNSC 11 years ago is now repeating itself.
					
					 If the UNSC wants to discuss the human rights issue, it should not read the "report" deliberately forged by the CI without witnessing the DPRK's reality with its own eyes but call into question the human rights abuses rampant in the U.S.
					
					 Why the UNSC is turning its face from the inhuman torture practiced by the CIA over which the UN Anti-Torture Committee expressed particular concern and which is dealt with in the 6, 000 page-long report presented by the Intelligence Committee of the U.S. Senate, and such despicable human rights abuses as white American policemen's brutalities of shooting and strangling black men to death.
					
					 If the UNSC handles the "human rights issue" in the DPRK while shutting its eyes to the serious human rights issue in the U.S., one of its permanent members, while failing to settle the pending and urgent issues directly linked with the world peace and security, it will prove itself its miserable position that it has turned into a tool for U.S. arbitrary practices just as everybody can hear everywhere.
					
					 The hostile action taken by the U.S. and its followers against the DPRK abusing the UNSC will certainly bring serious consequences and the provocateurs will be held wholly accountable as they have gone reckless.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Russian Ambassador
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Russian Ambassador
Pyongyang, December 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, had a talk with Alexandr Timonin, Russian ambassador to the DPRK who paid a farewell call on him, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Tuesday.

articles.title: Congratulations to New Swiss President
articles.content:
Congratulations to New Swiss President
Pyongyang, December 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on Dec. 6 sent a congratulatory message to Simonetta Sommaruga on her election as president of the Swiss Confederation. 
					 In the message Kim Yong Nam wished the Swiss president success in her responsible work for the prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Greetings to Angolan Party
articles.content:
Greetings to Angolan Party
Pyongyang, December 9 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea Tuesday sent a message of greeting to the Central Committee of the Popular Liberation Movement of Angola on the occasion of its 58th founding anniversary. 
					 The message expressed belief that the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two parties would grow stronger in the interests of the peoples of the two countries, sincerely wishing the Movement bigger successes in its work for its development and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Reception Given at Cuban Embassy Here
articles.content:
Reception Given at Cuban Embassy Here
Pyongyang, December 9 (KCNA) -- Ambassador German Hermin Ferras Alvarez and Military Attache Roman O. Jimenez Ortega of the Cuban embassy here gave a reception at their embassy on Tuesday on the 58th Day of Cuban Revolutionary Armed Forces.
					 Present there on invitation were O Kum Chol, vice-chief of the Korean People's Army General Staff, KPA generals and officers, officials concerned and members of foreign embassies here.
					
					 Staff members of the Cuban embassy were present there.

articles.title: Youth League Delegation Back Home
articles.content:
Youth League Delegation Back Home
Pyongyang, December 9 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League led by Jong Yong Won, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the youth league, came back home Tuesday after visiting Russia.

articles.title: Furniture and Daily Necessities Design Exhibition Held
articles.content:
Furniture and Daily Necessities Design Exhibition Held
Pyongyang, December 9 (KCNA) -- The design exhibition of furniture and daily necessities closed with due ceremony. 
					 The exhibition opened on September 10. 
					
					 On display were designs of furniture and daily necessities and products.
					
					 While the exhibition was under way, participants and visitors to the exhibition swapped the good experience gained in developing modern furniture and daily necessities suited to the trend of the times and requirements of customers. 
					
					 The closing ceremony took place at the State Industrial Art Exhibition Hall on Tuesday.
					
					 Present there were Vice-Premier of the Cabinet Kim Yong Jin, officials concerned, creators, designers, teachers and students.
					
					 The Taedonggang Furniture Factory, Phohang District Commercial Agency in Chongjin City and other units and individuals were highly appreciated at the exhibition.
					
					 The vice-premier made a closing address.

articles.title: New Educational Aid Software Developed
articles.content:
New Educational Aid Software Developed
Pyongyang, December 9 (KCNA) -- The information technology college under the State Academy of Sciences of the DPRK has recently developed a new educational aid multimedia authoring tool.
					 In this regard, Kang Yong Song, a department head of the college, told KCNA:
					
					 The existing tools for authoring multimedia have limited functions with their source codes hidden. But the new one has more functions easy to use, making it possible to change the authoring mode.
					
					 It also ensures high audio quality and high definition.

articles.title: Injection for Heart Diseases Developed
articles.content:
Injection for Heart Diseases Developed
Pyongyang, December 9 (KCNA) -- The Koryo Medicine Institute of the Academy of Koryo Medicine in the DPRK has developed a new injection for heart diseases.
					 The injection is made of extracts from Salvia mileriorrhiza and ginkgo nut and has no side effect.
					
					 It has a good effect on the dilation of coronary arteries, thus preventing heart attack. It is also considered to be efficacious against thrombus.
					
					 It won high appraisal at the 13th national exhibition of inventions and new technologies.

articles.title: Japan's Discrimination against Koreans Schools in Japan Protested
articles.content:
Japan's Discrimination against Koreans Schools in Japan Protested
Pyongyang, December 9 (KCNA) -- The "citizens council for defending our school and children" grouping 16 civic and public organizations of south Korea held a press conference outside the Japanese embassy in Seoul on Dec. 5, urging the Japanese authorities to stop the discrimination against Korean schools in Japan, according to south Korean Yonhap News.
					 It said that the Japanese government excluded the Korean schools from the tuition-free program for senior high schools, adding this is the human rights abuse as it violates the Japanese Constitution and the international rules on human rights and the International Convention on the Rights of the Children.
					
					 It urged the Japanese government to stop the discrimination against the students of Korean schools and apply the tuition-free program to them, too.
					
					 Friday meetings of Koreans in Japan have taken place in protest against Japan's discrimination against the Korean schools, it said, calling for holding a meeting on Friday every week in solidarity with their struggle.

articles.title: Enemy Can Never Shake Idea and Faith of Service Personnel and People of DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Enemy Can Never Shake Idea and Faith of Service Personnel and People of DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, December 9 (KCNA) -- The idea and faith of the service personnel and people of the DPRK to be loyal to the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu remain unshakable in any storm and stress, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in an article.
					 The DPRK is an invincible socialist power centered on the popular masses as it achieved the single-minded unity of its leader, party and masses, notes the article, and goes on:
					
					 Its genuine socialist system whereby the popular masses became the masters of state and society and everything serves them has taken its deep roots in the hearts of its service personnel and people as their life and soul and has grown stronger, weathering the stern tempest of history.
					
					 In the last century when socialism was frustrated in various countries, the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet group noisily talked about the "end of socialism."
					
					 Nevertheless, the DPRK resolutely overcame all stern trials and difficulties under the banner of Songun and remained undeterred by any defamation and smear campaign by the enemy. It added glory to the advantages of its social system and is now dashing ahead toward the final victory of the cause of building a thriving nation.
					
					 Its service personnel and people are dynamically advancing toward a bright future along the road of independence, Songun and socialism under the leadership of the great party.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet group's ridiculous trumpeting about "human rights" sounds like no more than a shriek of those frightened by the might of the invincible DPRK to its service personnel and people.
					
					 With no conspiratorial racket can the enemy shake the steel-strong faith and will of the service personnel and people of the DPRK to invariably advance along the road of independence, Songun and socialism, concludes the article.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams UN's Unfair Behavior under U.S. Pressure
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams UN's Unfair Behavior under U.S. Pressure
Pyongyang, December 9 (KCNA) -- Recently the United Nations tarnished its image by adopting the anti-DPRK "human rights resolution", yielding to the U.S. highhanded and arbitrary practices. This attitude is not something new as it was taken at a time when the international community was becoming vocal denouncing the UN for being reduced to a puppet of the U.S.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says this in a commentary. 
					
					 The UN used to adopt resolutions contrary to the UN Charter under the manipulation of the U.S. styling itself an "international gendarme" and "international judge" while unreasonably  interfering in internal affairs of sovereign states, thereby inviting international denunciation, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 That was why the DPRK solemnly clarified its principled stand of categorically denying and rejecting the "human rights resolution" cooked up by the U.S. and its allies by abusing the UN. 
					
					 Watching the course in which the U.S. fabricated the "human rights resolution" against the DPRK through its arbitrary practice, the Korean people have deeply grasped the truth once again that if any one fails to believe in its own strength, it will depend on big powers and sell out its dignity and honor and become their puppet whether it likes or not. 
					
					 The U.S. is getting evermore undisguised in its moves to internationalize the "human rights issue" of the DPRK and stifle it under the pretext of it. 
					
					 The further the U.S. intensifies the anti-DPRK "human rights" racket, the stronger the DPRK's war deterrence grows. It will prove to be a more powerful weapon to mercilessly annihilate the U.S. and its allies.

articles.title: Minju Joson Blasts Japan for Denying Past Crimes
articles.content:
Minju Joson Blasts Japan for Denying Past Crimes
Pyongyang, December 9 (KCNA) -- The Japanese Foreign Ministry recently demanded the rewriting of the page dealing with the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army in textbooks for high school students in California, the U.S.
					 Minju Joson in a commentary says Japan's denial of its crime-woven past shows that it is afraid of the truth being disclosed to the world.
					
					 By flatly rejecting the crimes the nature of which was revealed by testimonies made by victims and historical data, Japan seeks to realize its ambition for overseas expansion, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 For this reason Japan makes far-fetched assertions, squarely challenging the international community demanding Japan redress its dirty past crimes.
					
					 It has no human traits such as guilty conscience and sense of shame.
					
					 Japan brutally massacred more than one million Koreans, forcibly drafted millions to battlefields and sites of hard labor and reduced 200 000 Korean women to sexual slaves. Yet, this human rights abuser had the face to charge the DPRK with "human rights abuses". Its behavior is stunning world peoples.
					
					 Had they had even a bit of human conscience, it would not have thought of such a shameless and impudent act.
					
					 Japan should break with militarism that turned it into a morally vulgar nation.
					
					 Otherwise, it will face physical destruction due to that militarism.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Accused of Mulling Starting New Broadcasting Service
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Accused of Mulling Starting New Broadcasting Service
Pyongyang, December 9 (KCNA) -- Anti-DPRK plot-breeding organs in south Korea are mulling starting "Broadcasting Service for People's Unity" early next year at the instigation of the puppet regime. Such organs are trumpeting that the broadcasting service might lead "north Korean society to changes", while calling for convening a "meeting of sponsors" and working out a "plan for securing listeners from the north."
					 Minju Joson Tuesday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 This is another challenge to the DPRK and an unpardonable act of beclouding the prospect of mending the bedeviled inter-Korean relations.
					
					 What the puppet regime seeks through the start of the broadcasting service is to break the single-minded unity of the service personnel and people of the DPRK and destabilize it through persistent anti-DPRK smear campaign. 
					
					 However, this is no more than a daydream, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 Such anti-DPRK moves to start the above-said broadcasting service would only bring into bolder relief the true colors of the sycophants towards the U.S. and traitors.
					
					 It is worth recalling once again that the DPRK had already declared its resolution to decisively frustrate the anti-DPRK "human rights" racket kicked up by the U.S. imperialists and their followers and the Park Geun Hye group through its toughest counteraction.
					
					 The puppet regime had better behave itself, mindful that its projected broadcasting service would only precipitate its miserable end.

articles.title: S. Korean Military Group's Psychological Warfare Slammed
articles.content:
S. Korean Military Group's Psychological Warfare Slammed
Pyongyang, December 9 (KCNA) --  The Joint Measure Committee for Checking Anti-DPRK Leaflet Scattering Operation and the  Construction of Aegibong Light Tower of south Korea held a press conference on Dec. 7 in Kimpho City, Kyonggi Province, denouncing the puppet military group for its psychological warfare against the north, according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					 It said that the General Association of Christians of south Korea is seeking to start the construction of make-shift facilities for the "lighting ceremony on Christmas" on the site of the light tower from that day with the permission of the Defence Ministry.    
					
					 This action is to disturb peace under the mask of religion and spark a military conflict in the light of the fact that psychological warfare is considered as a combat action under international law, it noted.
					
					 It demanded an immediate halt to the above-said moves.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Urges Chief Executive to Show Her Will to Improve Inter-Korean Relations
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Urges Chief Executive to Show Her Will to Improve Inter-Korean Relations
Pyongyang, December 9 (KCNA) -- The south Korean paper Hangyore carried an editorial titled "Process for Improving South-North Relations Requires Consistent Will" on Dec. 8.
					 If the frozen south-north relations go on next year, it will be harder to create an atmosphere of improving the relations, the editorial said.
					
					 The editorial urged the "government" to do away with the disorder and improvisatorial attitude manifested in the "policy towards the north".
					
					 What is the most important is Park Geun Hye's attitude, the editorial noted, holding if she doesn't have a will to improve the relations, the existing confrontation will continue.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Remembered in Russia, Belarus
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Remembered in Russia, Belarus
Pyongyang, December 9 (KCNA) -- Political parties of Russia and Belarus respectively posted articles on their websites on Nov. 27 and 29 on the occasion of the 3rd anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The Moscow City Committee of the All-Union Communist Party of Bolsheviks of Russia in an article titled "3rd Anniversary of Demise of Kim Jong Il, chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK" said:
					
					 The Korean people are adding luster to Kim Jong Il's feats, always remembering him.
					
					 The Korean people accelerated the vigorous advance to implement his last instructions in all fabrics of social life and thus brought about great changes.
					
					 Scientists and technicians of the DPRK successfully launched satellite "Kwangmyongsong 3-2" and thus implemented his last instruction for launching the first working satellite of the DPRK in 2012, the 100th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 It is the firm faith and steadfast will of the Korean people to thoroughly implement the plans and last instructions of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 A district committee of the Vitebsk City Committee of the Communist Party of Belarus in an article titled "Mt. Paektu and Kim Jong Il" praised the revolutionary career of the peerlessly great man who frustrated every move of the U.S. imperialists to stifle the DPRK with his matchless pluck in the spirit of Mt. Paektu and thus performed undying feats before the country and nation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Remembered by Iranian, Nigerian Political Figures
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Remembered by Iranian, Nigerian Political Figures
Pyongyang, December 9 (KCNA) -- Iranian and Nigerian political figures released statements on Dec. 3 to honor the memory of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Hamid Reza Taraghi, vice-general secretary of the Islamic Coalition Party of Iran, said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il was a great thinker and great statesman who performed great feats in the history of the Korean nation and the history of world politics.
					
					 He turned the DPRK into a political and ideological power and a military power with his rare wisdom and energetic Songun leadership and thus reliably protected the sovereignty of the country and made undying contributions to the human cause of independence.
					
					 The great feats he performed in the struggle against the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces will always be remembered by all the countries and nations desirous of independence.
					
					 Ibrahim Mantu, member of the Credit Committee of the People's Democratic Party of Nigeria, said:
					
					 Not only the Korean people but also all other world progressives are paying highest tribute to Kim Jong Il, looking back on his great career and undying feats with deep emotion.
					
					 He was a peerlessly brilliant commander who frustrated the imperialists' moves to stifle the DPRK and turned it into a satellite manufacturer and launcher and nuclear weapons state.
					
					 He is always remembered as the sun by the Korean people and all other world progressives for the undying feats he performed in the socialist cause and the cause of independence against imperialism.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Remembered Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Remembered Abroad
Pyongyang, December 9 (KCNA) -- Events were held in various countries on the occasion of the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 They included a remembrance meeting, film show and book exhibition held in Nigeria, a lecture and photo exhibition in Uganda, a seminar on Kim Jong Il's exploits and film show and round-table talks in Germany on December 1 and 2.
					
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were photos dealing with the exploits of President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on display there were works of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu and books introducing successes achieved by the army and people of the DPRK in building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 Participants in the film shows watched Korean films dealing with the wise leadership and exploits of the peerlessly great man.
					
					 An official of Nigeria in his speech said that Kim Jong Il is a great man as he turned the DPRK into a socialist country fully exercising its independent rights in all fields on the basis of tremendous military capability.
					
					 Speakers including the chairman of the Ugandan National Executive Committee of the Pan-African Movement highly praised the President and Kim Jong Il as distinguished leaders as they rendered material and moral assistance to African people in their struggle for the liberation from colonial rule and the building of new society and for their socio-economic development and unity.
					
					 The chairman of the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany at a seminar noted that Kim Jong Il won one victory after another in the acute confrontation with the U.S. imperialists by consolidating the single-minded unity of the leader, party and masses as firm as rock.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Russia
Pyongyang, December 9 (KCNA) -- A committee for honoring the memory of leader Kim Jong Il was formed by the Sankt-Peterburg City Committee of the Lenin Young Communist League of the Russian Federation on December 3.
					 The first secretary of the Sankt-Peterburg City Committee was elected chairperson of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold political and cultural events to praise Kim Jong Il's revolutionary career and exploits from December 3 to 22.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Highly Praised by Foreign Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Highly Praised by Foreign Organizations
Pyongyang, December 9 (KCNA) -- Iranian and Bangladeshi organizations released statements on December 3 on the occasion of the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The Iranian Workers' House in its statement said that Kim Jong Il was a great man recognized by the world and prominent statesman as he devoted his whole life to the sacred cause for the happiness of the Korean people and prosperity of the country, national reunification and global independence.
					
					 The statement went on:
					
					 He turned the DPRK into a powerful socialist state while frustrating the moves of the U.S. imperialists and their followers to isolate it.
					
					 He ushered in a new era of national reunification and performed immortal exploits before the times and history with his energetic leadership.
					
					 The Bangladesh Institute of the Juche Idea in its statement noted that Kim Jong Il comprehensively developed in depth the Juche idea and Songun idea and firmly defended socialism from the moves of the imperialists to stifle the DPRK by pursuing the unique Songun politics.
					
					 He turned the DPRK into a political and ideological power with single-mined unity by providing the Songun revolutionary leadership and ushered in a new era of prosperity for building a thriving nation on the land of the country, it stressed.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded by Foreign Media
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded by Foreign Media
Pyongyang, December 9 (KCNA) -- Foreign Media dedicated special write-ups and reports to the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The November 30th issue of the Kuwaiti newspaper Times allotted one whole page to the article titled "Kim Jong Il, eternal leader of the Korean people" illustrated with a portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il and a photo of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The paper said that Kim Jong Il devoted his whole life to the building of a prosperous country with his ardent love for the country and its people.
					
					 Referring to his ideological and theoretical exploits and Songun leadership feats, it noted that his greatest exploit was that he firmly defended socialism despite the sternest ordeal and laid powerful political, military and economic foundations for the prosperity of the nation.
					
					 The Egyptian newspaper Al Akhbar carried a special write-up accompanied with a portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il on Nov. 29.
					
					 The paper carried articles subtitled "Even sky mourns", "Undying feats performed for cause of global independence" and "Songun politics and Korean Peninsula" illustrated with a photo showing the panoramic view of Pyongyang under the title of "Third anniversary of demise of HE Kim Jong Il, eternal leader of the people's Korea".
					
					 Cambodian broadcasting F.M. 90.5 Radio aired the following program titled "Eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK)" on Dec. 1:
					
					 The Korean people are holding Kim Jong Il in high esteem as eternal general secretary of the WPK.
					
					 Kim Jong Il's ideas and theories are immutable truth and eternal banner of victory for the WPK and the Korean people and a motive force encouraging the socialist cause in the DPRK.
					
					 He will always live along with the WPK leading the Korean people's dynamic advance for building a thriving nation.
					
					 On the same day Cambodian Apsara Television and Radio aired a similar program.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Lauded by Int'l Figure
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Lauded by Int'l Figure
Pyongyang, December 9 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il exalted the dignity of socialist Korea before the world.
					 Guy Dupre, secretary general of the International Liaison Committee for Reunification and Peace in Korea, said this in a statement issued on Dec. 1 on the occasion of the 3rd anniversary of Kim Jong Il's demise.
					
					 He said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il, a staunch guardian of the socialist cause, devoted his whole life to the building of a thriving nation and reunification in Korea and independence, peace and security of the world.
					
					 He developed and enriched the Juche idea and Songun idea, the guiding idea of the era of independence.
					
					 He also developed the Workers' Party of Korea into a powerful, revolutionary party and a dignified party leading the building of a thriving nation to victory, a party absolutely supported and trusted by the people.
					
					 He also trained the Korean People's Army as an invincible army and combat ranks reliably protecting the socialist motherland and people and the revolution.
					
					 He held higher the banner of Songun late in the last century when the Korean people faced the harshest ordeals because of the vicious moves of the imperialist allied forces to stifle the DPRK, thus bringing about a turning point in the building of a thriving nation.
					
					 He dedicated his all to the reunification of the country and the unity and prosperity of the nation.
					
					 He formulated the three principles of national reunification, the ten-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo set forth by President Kim Il Sung as the three charters for national reunification.
					
					 He provided the north-south summit in June 2000 and made sure that the June 15 joint declaration, the landmark of Korea's reunification, was adopted.
					
					 The world progressives are paying highest tribute to Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Carried by Romanian Paper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Carried by Romanian Paper
Pyongyang, December 9 (KCNA) -- The December issue of the Romanian newspaper Romania Muncitoare carried a gist of leader Kim Jong Il's work "On Preserving the Juche Character and National Character of the Revolution and Construction".
					 The work, published on June 19, Juche 86 (1997), clarifies the idea that it is the fundamental principle to be maintained in accomplishing the socialist cause to preserve the Juche character and national character of the revolution and construction and indicates the tasks and ways for doing so.

articles.title: Statement of NDC of DPRK Supported by Austrian Organization
articles.content:
Statement of NDC of DPRK Supported by Austrian Organization
Pyongyang, December 9 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity Committee of Unionists for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea in Austria issued a statement on Dec. 3 in support of the statement issued by the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK.
					The statement said:
					
					We fully support the statement of the NDC of the DPRK.
					
					"Human rights" racket against the DPRK was kicked off by the U.S. imperialists who have still refused to respond to the DPRK's sincere offer of peace negotiations though they have perpetrated grave war crimes.
					
					The U.S. put people to torture while operating secret jails in Guantanamo and European countries and is slapping illegal sanctions against world progressive countries including the DPRK and Cuba to stifle them.
					
					Some member states of the European Union are blindly following the U.S. imperialists' vicious "human rights" racket.
					
					Regretfully, the United Nations passed "resolutions" encroaching upon the sovereignty of its member states, thus violating the UN Charter.
					
					We condemn the "human rights" racket against the DPRK and appeal to the world progressive working peoples to conduct positive activities for solidarity with it.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un presencia funcion de grupos artisticos de esposas de oficiales del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un presencia funcion de grupos artisticos de esposas de oficiales del EPC
Pyongyang, 9 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, presencio, junto con las participantes en la 2a Conferencia de Activistas de las Familias de Militares del EPC, la funcion conjunta de los grupos artisticos de esposas de oficiales de las unidades ganadoras en el 5o concurso del 2o periodo de los mismos grupos y pronuncio un discurso.
					El salio al palco con Ri Sol Ju.
					
					Los grupos artisticos de las unidades 564, 966, 233, 593, 287, 630, 380, 243, 468 y 600 interpretaron en la ocasion el coro en serie "Eterna sonrisa", la recitacion de poesia y la narracion "Familiares del monte Paektu y el socialismo", el relato "Padre" y otras piezas.
					
					Las ejecutantes describieron en tono patetico el noble mundo ideo-espiritual de las esposas de oficiales que anorando y venerando mucho a los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il y al Comandante Supremo, marcan los pasos con  la direccion del Mariscal sobre la revolucion del Songun.
					
					Disfrutaron la funcion Hwang Pyong So, So Hong Chan y Ryom Chol Song.
					
					Terminada la funcion, el Mariscal subio a la escena y pronuncio un discurso.
					
					Dijo que gracias a las esposas que ayudan con sinceridad a sus esposos uniformados, el Ejercito Popular cumple bien con su noble mision y deber asumidos ante la epoca y la historia, o sea, defender con firmeza el partido y la revolucion sin vacilacion alguna ante cualquier conflagracion.
					
					Continuo que sin olvidar ni un momento la confianza y esperanza que le depositan las esposas de oficiales, tomo la decision como Comandante Supremo de conducir mejor a la senda de victoria eterna a las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias que constituyen los fusiles empunados por los esposos e hijos de ellas.
					
					Apunto que es un gran orgullo para nuestro partido y patria tener al gran contingente de las revolucionarias tan firmes como ellas.
					
					Senalo que los maridos e hijos de Vds, quienes cultivan el ardiente amor a la patria y el odio a los enemigos bajo la atencion de sus queridas  esposas, lucharan con mas valentia y  enarbolaran siempre la bandera roja de la revolucion para vivir dignamente ante ellas.
					
					Encomendo a todas las participantes en la conferencia y otras esposas de los militares a cumplir mejor su mision para que sus queridos esposos e hijos sean mas fieles a la revolucion y abran en la delantera el camino no explorado por la prosperidad de la patria.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un toma foto con activistas de familias de militares de EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un toma foto con activistas de familias de militares de EPC
Pyongyang, 9 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, se retrato con las participantes en la 2a Conferencia de Activistas de Familias de Militares del EPC.
					La 2o Conferencia sirve de un motivo importante para defender y glorificar la idea de dar prioridad al trabajo para con las familias de los militares e indelebles hazanas de los grandes Hombres del monte Paektu y mejorar tal trabajo conforme a la nueva demanda de la revolucion en desarrollo, subrayo el Mariscal y felicito a las participantes que hayan realizado con exito la conferencia con la conciencia politica y el entusiasmo revolucionario.
					
					Recordo que bajo el excepcional amor y cuidado de los grandes Hombres del monte Paektu, las familias de nuestros militares han crecido como la nuera mayor del pais y el grueso de las revolucionarias que se encargan de una parte del fortalecimiento de las fuerzas militares y anadio que en la historia orgullosa de nuestras fuerzas armadas revolucionarias estan impregnados los meritos de las familias de los militares quienes apreciando mas los intereses estatales que los familiares han dedicado los suenos e ideales de juventud y la felicidad de su familia al fortalecimiento de las fuerzas armadas.
					
					Evaluo a las familias de los militares que van marcando pasos de sus esposos, revolucionarios de fusil decididos a luchar a riesgo de la vida para el partido y la revolucion, la patria y el pueblo en la primera linea de la lucha clasista y companeros mas intimos del Comandante Supremo, y atienden con el amor maternal la vida de los soldados.
					
					Al referirse a que son tan grandes la confianza y la esperanza del partido en las familias de los militares, expreso una conviccion de que ellas ayudaran bien a sus esposos y lucharan con la posicion de soldados que estan siempre en el frente.
					
					Al Mariscal le acompanaron Hwang Pyong So, Hyon Yong Chol, So Hong Chan, Pak Yong Sik, Ryom Chol Song y Jo Kyong Chol.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se reune con el embajador ruso
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se reune con el embajador ruso
Pyongyang, 9 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, departio el dia 9 en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae con el embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario ruso en Corea, Alexandr Timonin, quien le hizo una visita de despedida.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita al electo presidente suizo
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita al electo presidente suizo
Pyongyang, 9 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 6 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente electo de la Confederacion Suiza, Simoneta Jomaruga.
					En la misiva, el remitente expresa su deseo de que el destinatario logre exitos en su trabajo responsable para la prosperidad del pais.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun critica el proceder parcial de la ONU
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun critica el proceder parcial de la ONU
Pyongyang, 9 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Hace poco, la ONU mancho por si mismo su prestigio por haber aprobado la "resolucion de DDHH" anti-RPDC obedeciendo a ciegas al despotismo y arbitrariedades de Estados Unidos. 
					Ahora en la palestra internacional se aumentan mas las criticas a la ONU convertida en un aparato titere que actua segun la coercion de EE.UU.
					
					Revela el periodico Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual de este martes y continua:
					
					Ya desde antes, la ONU aprobaba las resoluciones a contrapelo de su Carta actuando bajo el mando de EE.UU. que interviene atrevidamente en los asuntos internos de los paises soberanos como si fuera "policia internacional" y "juez internacional". 
					
					Por esta razon, hemos declarado al interior y exterior la posicion de principios de no reconocer la "resolucion de DDHH", inventada por EE.UU. y sus satelites abusando de la arena de la ONU, y negarla y rechazarla totalmente. 
					
					Viendo el proceso de invencion de la reciente "resolucion de DDHH" anti-RPDC de la ONU, volvemos a sacar la verdad de que los paises que no confian en sus propias fuerzas llegaran a obedecer a grandes potencias, a vender la dignidad y el honor de su propia nacion y a actuar como sus sirvientes. 
					
					Se tornan mas siniestras las maniobras de EE.UU. tendentes a internacionalizar el "problema de DDHH" de la RPDC y tomarlo como pretexto para aplastarla. 
					
					Cuanto mas se intensifique la campana de "DDHH" anti-RPDC de EE.UU., mas se consolidara el disuasivo de guerra de la RPDC para aniquilar implacablemente a EE.UU. y sus satelites.

articles.title: Minju Joson denuncia demanda del MINREX de Japon
articles.content:
Minju Joson denuncia demanda del MINREX de Japon
Pyongyang, 9 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Hace poco, la cancilleria japonesa exigio enmendar el parrafo sobre la esclavitud sexual para el ejercito japones establecida en el siglo pasado, el cual esta compilado en el manual de la escuela superior de la region de California de Estados Unidos.
					En un comentario individual divulgado el dia 9, el rotativo Minju Joson subraya que esa demanda insinua que Japon niega su pasado lleno de crimenes y teme mucho a que la gente conozca los hechos de la historia.
					
					El comentarista senala que Japon esta negando cinicamente sus crimenes revelados ya por los testimonios de victimas y los datos de historia con el objetivo principal de realizar a toda costa su ambicion expansionista a ultramar, y prosigue:
					
					Asi Japon esta desafiando frontalmente a la demanda de la sociedad internacional de liquidar su expediente criminal.
					
					Actualmente, ese pais no siente ninguna culpabilidad o verguenza.
					
					Durante el coloniaje sobre Corea en el siglo pasado, los imperialistas japoneses asesinaron bestialmente a mas de un millon de coreanos, arrestaron por la fuerza a otros millones que fueron enviados a los campos de guerra y trabajos de esclavitud y obligaron a 200 mil coreanas la vida de esclava sexual.
					
					Sin embargo, Japon trata de tildar ahora a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea de "delincuente de DDHH", lo cual deja consternado a todo el mundo.
					
					Si Japon tuviera una pizca de conciencia, no se habria atrevido a esa accion tan cinica.
					
					Japon debe separarse del militarismo que degenero moralmente a un Estado entero.
					
					En el caso contrario, sera arruinado tambien en lo fisico.
